summary: Feature request to allow users to set search attributes in the dev server startup options, which would translate to --search-attribute command-line flags. This follows the CLI implementation in temporalio/cli#593.
userImpact: Users can configure search attributes directly in dev server startup options instead of manually passing command-line flags.
proposedFix: Implement search attributes parameter in dev server options that translates to --search-attribute calls, matching the CLI implementation.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to support search attributes configuration in dev server startup options.
keyQuote: users should be allowed to set search attributes in dev server option that translate to `--search-attribute` calls
